title: Machine Learning: A Probabilistic Perspective
abstract: This textbook offers a comprehensive introduction to machine learning from a probabilistic perspective. It covers both the theoretical foundations and practical applications of modern machine learning techniques.

title: Attention Is All You Need
abstract: The dominant sequence transduction models are based on complex recurrent or convolutional neural networks. We propose a new simple network architecture, the Transformer, based solely on attention mechanisms.

title: Deep Learning for Computer Vision
authors: Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, Aaron Courville
abstract: This book introduces a broad range of topics in deep learning, covering mathematical and conceptual background, deep learning techniques, and applications in computer vision.
